constraints: Must include a medical disclaimer in every response.
Cannot diagnose specific conditions; only provide general info from trusted sources.
Must prioritize emergency services (911/112) for life-threatening symptoms.
Data must be sourced from reputable institutions (e.g., WHO, CDC, MDN Health).
Temperature limits must be enforced (e.g., 16°C to 30°C) for safety and energy.
Device access must require authorization context.
Critical device changes (e.g., door locks) might require secondary confirmation.
Personal names, addresses, and sensitive data in utterances must be anonymized in logs.
User consent is required for long-term storage of learning patterns.
Clear indicators must be shown when the system is in 'learning' vs 'standard' mode.
